thread.title: Did you see these Bravo reality show stars in Breckenridge this weekend?
thread.title_full: Did you see these Bravo reality show stars in Breckenridge this weekend?

author: Sara Grant
title: Did you see these Bravo reality show stars in Breckenridge this weekend?
text:
Did you see these Bravo reality show stars in Breckenridge this weekend? The Toms and Jax of ‚ÄúVanderpump Rules‚Äù were spotted around the mountain town By Sara Grant , The Know March 13, 2017 
‚Äî Jax Taylor (@mrjaxtaylor) March 12, 2017 
One of reality TV‚Äôs most bromantical bromances visited Colorado this weekend when the Toms (both Sandoval and Schwartz) and Jax Taylor of Bravo‚Äôs ‚ÄúVanderpump Rules‚Äù were spotted tweeting and ‚Äògramming around Breckenridge. 
The L.A. trio of models/bartenders/bubbas traded in dresses ‚Äî they proudly dressed in drag for Tom Schwartz‚Äôs bachelor party in a recent episode ‚Äî for ski jackets and goggles during a ‚Äúguys weekend‚Äù of shredding a little Colorado powder. 
The first breadcrumb was dropped by Tom Schwartz Saturday evening, though ominous to those not familiar with the base of Peak 9 or the Breckenridge Resort logo. Oh yeah babe pic.twitter.com/0D7uHXgbjS 
‚Äî tom schwartz (@twschwa) March 11, 2017 
Then Sunday he tagged the resort in a rare helmet head photo of Sandoval without his signature braids in his hair. His now infamous ‚Äúbraid guy‚Äù must not travel. Chilling w these two goons @breckenridgemtn pic.twitter.com/Uoj7Gdnd56 
‚Äî tom schwartz (@twschwa) March 12, 2017 
Leave it to Taylor to follow up with a selfie. A post shared by Jax Taylor (@mrjaxtaylor) on Mar 12, 2017 at 3:27pm PDT 
‚Ä¶and a Boomerang A post shared by Jax Taylor (@mrjaxtaylor) on Mar 12, 2017 at 8:28pm PDT 
‚Ä¶and a glamour shot. A post shared by Jax Taylor (@mrjaxtaylor) on Mar 13, 2017 at 8:05am PDT 
They were also spotted around town snapping pics with fans at bars like Downstairs at Eric‚Äôs and Cecilia‚Äôs. Megan Kahler was visiting Breckenridge from Fort Myers, Fla., when she met Sandoval and Schwartz at Jake‚Äôs Dive Bar. She said they were approachable and happy to pose for photos, an added bonus to an already great trip. ‚ÄúThey blended right in and no one I was with knew who they were,‚Äù she added. A post shared by Hayley S. (@hayyywire) on Mar 13, 2017 at 8:36am PDT A post shared by üåôkatie ashford (@k.at.ni.p) on Mar 11, 2017 at 11:43pm PST A post shared by Megs102881 (@megs102881) on Mar 12, 2017 at 7:38am PDT A post shared by Karli Kesson (@kkesson) on Mar 12, 2017 at 11:37pm PDT 
No signs of tequila Tom. 11
